extendedInfo.description: The OFFICIAL Hall Executive Suites Mobile Application!Hall Executive Suites provides long term and short term temporary accommodations for any budget or occasion.If you are planning to stay in Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada in either a fully-furnished or unfurnished luxury suite, we can offer you accommodations in the downtown or residential areas of the city. You will discover that our lodgings are far superior to hotel living, and that we provide all the comforts of home including fridge, stove, washer, dryer, high-speed wireless Internet, and cable TV.Our low rates mean personal stay, family reunions, conferences, office space and corporate meetings will be more affordable.For your convenience, we would also like to extend our services for FREE airport pickup and drop off from Regina airport (YQR).Your needs are always taken care of from cleaning to event planning, We can even offer suites that are pet-friendly!

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: Hall Executive Suites has some great places to stay in Regina, SK. With this app I can now make reservations direct from my mobile phone for my next visit to Regina.
reviews.author: A Google User
